{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Beer tasting {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Beer tasting A beer sommelier , also called a cicerone , is a trained professional, working in the hospitality and alcoholic beverage industry, who specializes in the service and knowledge of beer. The knowledge required for certification includes an understanding of styles, brewing, ingredients, history of beer and brewing, glassware, beer service, draught systems, beer tasting, and food pairings. The profession is relatively new but growing. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beer sommelier)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
